question: Which of the following was the main objective of ‘Nagpur Resolution’ that was adopted during the conference of ‘Improving Public Service Delivery – Role of Governments’ in Nagpur?
option1: Empower citizens by ensuring fast services
answer: Empower citizens by ensuring fast services
explanation: ‘Nagpur Resolution’ was adopted during the conference of ‘Improving Public Service Delivery – Role of Governments’ in Nagpur. The objective of the resolution was to empower citizens by ensuring fast services.
